channel.title: hard things on Maurício Antunes
channel.description: Recent content in hard things on Maurício Antunes

item.title: It is hard to be a better human
item.description: Being a better human being is a hard task. I know it because I try to be a better person. Day after day. And I just can’t. Of course I would love to write a long post about how I evolved from a disgusting to an awesome person people like to speak with. I am not this kind of person. But yeah, take note: I am getting better at it.
